disabled.description: Whether the button group is disabled

v-model.description: The value of the button is selected by default

plain.description: Whether it is a plain button

show-edit.description: Whether or not to display the Edit button will only take effect if more are displayed
show-edit.description_zh: 是否显示编辑按钮，只有在显示更多的情况下生效

:show-more.description: More buttons are displayed when the given number of buttons is exceeded
:show-more.description_zh: 当超过给定的按钮数量时显示更多按钮

text-field.description: button displays the field value of the text
text-field.description_zh: 按钮显示文字的字段值

value-field.description: button to select the field value of the value

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the selected button changes
events.description_zh: 当选中按钮发生改变时触发

events.name: edit
events.description: Triggered when the edit button is clicked
events.description_zh: 当编辑按钮被点击时触发

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slots, custom button group content
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽，自定义按钮组内容
